verses.verse: My heart <WH3820> is steadfast, <WH3559> God. <WH430> I will sing <WH7891> and I will make music <WH2167> with my soul. <WH3519>
Wake <WH5782> up, <WH5035> harp and lyre! <WH3658> I will wake <WH5782> up the dawn. <WH7837>
I will give thanks <WH3034> to you, <WH3068> Yahweh, among the nations. <WH5971> I will sing praises <WH2167> to you among the peoples. <WH3816>
For your loving kindness <WH2617> is great <WH1419> above the heavens. <WH8064> Your faithfulness <WH571> reaches to the skies. <WH7834>
Be exalted, <WH7311> God, <WH430> above the heavens! <WH8064> Let your glory <WH3519> be over all the earth. <WH776>
That your beloved <WH3039> may be delivered, <WH2502> save <WH3467> with your right hand, <WH3225> and answer us. <WH6030>
God <WH430> has spoken <WH1696> from his sanctuary: <WH6944> "In triumph, <WH5937> I will divide <WH2505> Shechem, <WH7927> and measure out <WH4058> the valley <WH6010> of Succoth. <WH5523>
Gilead <WH1568> is mine. <WH4519> Manasseh is mine. <WH669> Ephraim also is my helmet. <WH4581> <WH7218> Judah <WH3063> is my scepter. <WH2710>
Moab <WH4124> is my wash <WH7366> pot. <WH7993> I will toss my sandal <WH5275> on Edom. <WH123> I will shout <WH7321> over Philistia. <WH6429>"
Who will bring <WH2986> me into the fortified <WH4013> city? <WH5892> Who has led <WH5148> me to Edom? <WH123>
Haven't <WH2186> you rejected us, <WH430> God? You don't <WH3318> go forth, God, <WH430> with our armies. <WH6635>
Give <WH3051> us help <WH5833> against the enemy, <WH6862> for the help <WH8668> of man <WH120> is vain. <WH7723>
Through God, <WH430> we will do <WH6213> valiantly. <WH2428> For it is he who will tread down <WH947> our enemies. <WH6862>
